name: DetoxMe
description:
Green clay, certified organic nettle and charcoal combine to bring you a wonderful detox soap bar. This delightfully fruity bar will care for your skin on a whole new level. 

Minimum weight 150g - chunky, handmade, handcut bars offering you plenty of value for your money - guaranteed long-lasting and lush-lathering!

Ingredients: saponified olive, sustainable palm and coconut oils, extra shea butter for added nourishment, pure essential oils of pink grapefruit, geranium, may chang and lemon, certified organic nettle tea, macadamia oil and charcoal.

name: 4 Soaps - Your choice
description:
Four soaps - your choice. Buy in bulk and save

Visit www.ishbarn.blogspot.com to see our whole range.

Select any four of our soaps and take advantage of bulk buy savings. Soaps delivered in a sturdy cardboard box.

Minimum weight per soap is 150g – making our chunky, handmade, handcut bars real value for money - guaranteed long-lasting and lush-lathering!

All our soaps are made by us, by hand, and from scratch using the cold process method.

name: Green Ginger (with Lemon Butter Balls)
description:
Our Ginger Zinger! If you love the aroma of fresh ginger, you’ll love this soap.

We live in Australia’s prime ginger growing area, we have a tonne of it in the garden and use it all the time in the kitchen, so its only fitting that we add ginger soap in our range.

We’ve added a visual citrus treat too with lemon butter balls embedded inside made with extra Shea Butter and scented with a range of citrus-ry essential oils.

The butter balls peek out the top of the soap, like real ginger does as it grows in the ground.

You’ll find extra lemon myrtle essential oil in there too, to round it all out!

The lemony scents complement the ginger beautifully, plus it’s all wrapped up in Australian green clay – extra goodness and lovin’ for your skin.

Minimum weight 150g - chunky, handmade, handcut bars offering you plenty of value for your money - guaranteed long-lasting and lush-lathering!

Ingredients: saponified olive, sustainable palm and coconut oils, shea butter for added nourishment, pure essential oils of ginger, lemon myrtle, lemon eucalyptus, may chang, grapefruit with a touch of sandalwood and black pepper.

All our soaps are made by us, by hand, and from scratch using the cold process method.

name: Honey Honey / Honey & Oatmeal
description:
Do you need a super gentle soap for super sensitive skin? Our honey soaps fit the bill. No essential oils, no added colourants - just honey or honey and oatmeal. Guaranteed gentle and kind on your skin.

An all natural soap with the added goodness of real runny honey harvested by us from our own beehives!

Known for its skin loving qualities honey is a natural addition to our soap range.

Gentle on the skin, moisturising, nourishing... everything a good soap should be.

Ingredients; saponified olive, sustainable palm and coconut oils, honey, certified organic cocoa powder, and the extra deliciousness of shea butter. Ground oatmeal is included in the Honey & Oatmeal bar. No added colour, no added essential oils – just beautiful raw honey.

Minimum weight 150g – chunky, handmade, handcut bars offering you value for money - guaranteed long-lasting and lush-lathering!

All our soaps are made by us, by hand, and from scratch using the cold process method.

Not available in New Zealand.

name: Dog's Body
description:
Take care of your special pooch with our Dog’s Body soap. With added shea butter and oatmeal to condition, cool and calm itchy skin, this soap smells so good you might even want to use it on yourself.

Essential oils of pennyroyal, lavender, spearmint and lemongrass have been specially selected to keep bities at bay and leave you with the best smelling puppy in town.

Minimum weight 150g - chunky, handmade, handcut bars offering you plenty of value for your money - guaranteed* long-lasting and lush-lathering!

Ingredients: saponified olive, sustainable palm and coconut oils, shea butter for added nourishment, pure essential oils of pennyroyal, lavender, spearmint and lemongrass, and oatmeal.

*We cannot guarantee that our Dog's Body soap will make your dog enjoy their bath if they hate 'bath time' - sorry ;-)
